Description: This table stores information about auditing companies, including the company's name and timestamps for when the record was created or updated.
This table stores information about auditors, including auditor names, their associated auditing company, and timestamps for record creation and updates.

This table stores detailed information about audits conducted, including audit type, date, auditor details, department audited, source documents, compliance details, risk assessments, corrective action statuses, deadlines, AI-generated risk scores, and timestamps.
